body_html: Just a comment on 4. - I think we should keep things as public as possible to keep the API hackable. It was a conscious choice to keep everything public so it's easy to access anything users want to, but only maybe exposing the functions we want them to use in the docs / comments in the headers.

body: Just a comment on 4. - I think we should keep things as public as possible to keep the API hackable. It was a conscious choice to keep everything public so it's easy to access anything users want to, but only maybe exposing the functions we want them to use in the docs / comments in the headers.
